amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt from the provisions of the bill any significant regulatory action specifically aimed at limiting oil speculation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 112-616 to exempt from the provisions of the bill any significant regulatory action specifically aimed at limiting oil speculation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kucinich amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 245 (Roll no. 516).
